title: Trump says military members will be paid despite government shutdown
description: President claims he found a way to pay troops and directed Pentagon chief to release funds on 15 October
content:
Donald Trump claimed on Saturday that he had found a way to pay US military troops despite the ongoing federal government shutdown, saying he had instructed his defence secretary, Pete Hegseth, to release funds.
Posting on his Truth Social platform, ... [2980 chars]

title: Common cold, flu, Covid: Why is Britain so sick right now?
description: Why coughs and colds seem to be taking hold currently - and what you can do to protect yourself.
content:
Are you ill? If not, you probably know someone who is - or at the very least someone who has just recovered.
Coughs and colds, it seems, are rampant at the moment.
And, if the anecdotes of people I know are anything to go by, the bug going round seem... [3776 chars]

title: Windows 10: When you should update and what it means for you
description: Microsoft is ending support for Windows 10, which could make users vulnerable - here's how to get Windows 11.
content:
There is a big change coming for many people who use Windows computers.
Microsoft is ending support for its Windows 10 operating system, which means from Wednesday 14 October, these computers may be at risk.
This is because security updates will stop... [3157 chars]

title: World Cup qualifying roundup: Neves stuns Republic of Ireland with late goal
description: Rúben Neves scored a stoppage-time winner for Portugal while Serbia lost at home to Albania to open the door to England to seal World Cup qualification
content: Rúben Neves got Portugal out of jail with an injury-time World Cup qualifying winner against the Republic of Ireland after Cristiano Ronaldo had seen his penalty saved by Caoimhín Kelleher. Neves headed home in stoppage time to snatch a 1-0 win, four... [4471 chars]

title: Diane Keaton, star of Annie Hall and The Godfather, has died
description: Keaton was awarded an Oscar, a BAFTA and two Golden Globes in a career spanning more than five decades. Her unexpected death has been greeted with shock around the world.
content:
Actress Diane Keaton, who starred in films including The Godfather and Annie Hall, has died aged 79.
Keaton's daughter, Dexter Keaton White, confirmed her death to Sky's US partner network NBC News.
With a long career, across a series of movies that ... [2745 chars]
